messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Hi all...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/16/03 4:44:07 PM, LuvsToHomeschool@aol.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/16/03 4:44:07 PM, LuvsToHomeschool@... writes:

<< Hi, sorry i haven't been around. my computer BLEW itself up last week.
i'm on my brothers computer now, so don't have time to go into details... >>

Sorry Tracy.

Mine had a corrupted font. And so it wouldn't work at all.
Can you imagine "corrupted font" could totally put a computer out of
commission? It's like dying of a hangnail.

So after talking a long time to an Apple tech in Canada, and three calls to
AOL techs in India (who were way quicker and more patient than any I had ever
dealt with in Albuquerque or Virginia) for three separate questions of getting
all THAT hooked up...

Now I'm back but am too busy to BE back because (tadaa!!) Brenda and Tim is
here and we're alternately out and about and home being too hot and tired to be
out and about.
And Holly wants me to finish some pants I'm making her, and Maybe make her a
shirt and I need to find something important and secret for Kirby's birthday,
so we're "doing the mall" in a bit.

Sandra

messages.subject: Hi all...
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, sorry i haven t been around.  my computer BLEW itself up last week.  i m on my brothers computer now, so don t have time to go into details...this is a
messages.messageBody:
Hi, sorry i haven't been around. my computer BLEW itself up last week. i'm on my brothers computer now, so don't have time to go into details...this is a real pain in my rear. i should be back up and running sometime this weekend.

Tracy
